page.title: 12 HEALTH / LANDSCAPE
page.content: Holywell Park Old Peoples Home, 23 elderly residents,only 4male, reside here cared for by a staff consisting of a full time matron and part time helpers.The ages of the residents range from 68-98. Each resident has his own room, furniture and often a television.Most are widowed and have grandchildren. They consider they are well looked after and like the food and surroundings an 18th century house and grounds where W.G.Grace once played cricket. LANDSCAPE Culverstone Green covers 29.78 acres. There are 18 council houses all about 30 years old.Opposite there is a playground,a pond and a big field which belongs to Goose Farm.
